title.narrative: Do agricultural microplastics undermine food security and sustainable development in developing countries?

description.narrative: Do agricultural microplastics undermine food security and sustainable development in developing countries?

This project has 7 specific objectives: (1) Quantify the sources and drivers of agricultural plastics and their entry into agroecosystems; (2) Understand the behaviour, fate and impact of agricultural plastics on crop and soil health; (3) Quantify the risk of plastic contamination and associated contaminants entering the human food chain; (4) Identify growers' barriers and opportunities associated with removing plastics from soil; (5) Identify novel solutions for removing plastics from soil or minimising their environmental impact; (6) Provide critical guidance to regulators and policymakers on the threat posed by agricultural plastics and their effective management; (7) Generate legacy to ensure that the tools, technology, knowledge and partnerships developed in the research persist well beyond the project end-date and that the main outcomes continue to spread to other LMICs.
